# AltorLab

> Building for AI-Native Teams - Next generation business tools and AI adoption products

## About

AltorLab helps businesses adapt to the AI-first world with tools for optimization, insights, and seamless AI integration. We specialize in helping companies lead their industries in AI search and discovery.

Website: https://altorlab.com

## Products & Services

### GEO (Generative Engine Optimization)
Dominate AI search results across ChatGPT, Perplexity, Claude, and other AI platforms. We help businesses optimize their content and visibility for generative AI engines.

**Key Features:**
- AI Content Optimization
- Competitor Analysis
- Real-time Tracking across AI platforms
- Visibility analysis in AI search results

### SEO (Search Engine Optimization)
Complete SEO solution to rank #1 on Google with keyword research, technical audits, and competitor tracking.

**Key Features:**
- Keyword Strategy & Research
- Technical SEO Audits
- Rank Monitoring
- Backlink Analysis
- Content Optimization
- Competitor Tracking

### Paid Marketing
Maximize ROI with data-driven paid advertising campaigns across Google Ads, Meta, and LinkedIn.

**Key Features:**
- Campaign Strategy & Management
- Ad Creative Optimization
- Performance Analytics
- Budget Optimization
- A/B Testing
- Multi-platform Management

### Reviews Management
Build trust and reputation with automated review monitoring and response management.

**Key Features:**
- Review Monitoring across platforms
- Automated Response Systems
- Sentiment Analysis
- Reputation Tracking
- Review Generation Campaigns
- Crisis Management

### AI Transformation
Enterprise AI adoption services to help teams integrate AI tools and workflows effectively.

**Key Features:**
- AI Strategy Services
- Custom AI Solutions
- Team Training & Support
- Workflow Integration
- AI Tool Selection & Implementation
- Change Management

## AI Insights Dashboard

Our AI Insights Dashboard helps businesses understand their competitive position in AI search:

**Competition Analysis:** Analyze how your brand performs against competitors in AI search results across ChatGPT, Perplexity, Claude, and other AI platforms.

**Industry Insights:** Get data-driven insights specific to your industry. Track trends, identify opportunities, and discover winning content strategies.

**Tailored Strategy Execution:** Receive customized optimization strategies based on your competitive position with proven tactics to improve AI search rankings.

## Target Audience

- Businesses looking to optimize for AI search engines
- Companies seeking to improve their SEO and digital marketing
- Enterprises adopting AI tools and workflows
- Marketing teams wanting to dominate AI-powered search
- Businesses managing online reputation and reviews

## Key Differentiators

- **AI-First Approach:** We specialize in optimizing for the new generation of AI search engines, not just traditional search
- **Competitive Analysis:** See exactly how you compare to competitors in your category
- **Data-Driven:** All strategies backed by real data and analytics
- **Comprehensive Solutions:** From GEO to SEO to AI transformation
- **Proven Results:** 100+ businesses helped, 10k+ AI queries analyzed, 99% client satisfaction

2. **SaaS companies** looking to be recommended by AI assistants
3. **Local businesses** optimizing for AI-powered local search
4. **B2B companies** improving visibility in AI research tools

## Technology & Platforms

We optimize for and analyze:
- ChatGPT (OpenAI)
- Perplexity AI
- Claude (Anthropic)
- Google Gemini
- Traditional search engines (Google, Bing)
- Social media platforms (Meta, LinkedIn)
- Review platforms (Google Reviews, Yelp, Trustpilot)
